channel.title: Panglao on dbqp

item.title: Travelling Bohol on a 500,000KRW Budget
item.description:
Packing List

  • Clothes (2 spare outfits, sleepwear, underwear and socks for each day)
  • Rucksack and small crossbody bag
  • Sandals
  • Rash guard
  • Waterproof phone case
  • Medicine (Ibuprofen)
  • Charger
  • Power bank
  • Passport
  • Coin purse
  • Toiletries (soap, lotion, toothpaste, toothbrush)
  • Zip-lock bags

Pre-Booked Spending

  • Flight: 119,000 KRW
  • Airbnb: 27,070 KRW (54,139/2)
  • Travel insurance: 8,560KRW (17,120/2)
  • Exchanged: 279,888KRW (559,776/2) -> 200USD
  • Loboc River SUP: 20,200KRW (40,400/2)
  • Firefly SUP Tour: 23,900KRW (47,800/2)
  • JoySPA deposit: 10,000KRW
  • Airport pickup taxi: 400PHP (800/2)
  • Private 8hr taxi tour: 1,500PHP (3,000/2)
  • JoySPA: 1,200PHP

Local Spending
